name: Ubersoldier II
summary:
A tightly knit group of SS generals and officers, involved in the most heinous
and dark deeds, is seeking a way to save the remnants of the Third Empire. They
have conspired to move the leaders of the Reich, together with precious resources
and classified equipment, to a remote hideout in the Tibetan mountains.

name: Ubinota
summary: In a world where inhabitants live in the sky on floating islands made of cubes, a disaster threatens to make the population fall into the depths. The magic paint that keeps the cubes stuck together is drying out. Lucien, a trainee painter, fights with others against the disaster by repainting the islands.

name: Ubermosh: Wraith
summary: Ubermosh:Wraith is the fourth volume of the arcade series Ubermosh.

name: Ubermosh Vol.3
summary: The third volume of the arcade series Ubermosh.

name: UBoat
summary: UBOAT is a simulator of a submarine from WWII era. It is a survival sandbox with crew management mechanics while its primary theme is life of German sailors. The boat is their home, but it can become their grave at any time.

name: Ubermosh: Black
summary:
Ubermosh: Black is the hardcore version of the arcade game Ubermosh.
Cut bullets with your sword, shoot with heavy guns and splatter enemies with a rage fueled psionic wave.

name: U-Boats
summary: U-Boats is a submarine shooter that pits you in exciting top-down naval battles as you combine submersible stealth with action gameplay.

name: Ubermosh
summary: Ubermosh is an arcade game about cutting bullets with a sword, in a gun-filled cyberpunk mosh pit.

name: Ubermosh Vol.5
summary: The fifth volume of the arcade series Ubermosh.

name: Ubik
summary:
UBIK is a tactical action/strategy video game published and developed by Cryo Interactive Entertainment that was released in 1998. The game is very loosely based on a a Philip K. Dick book of the same name. In the game, the year is 2019. With genetic engineering and the development of replicant's, multiple company's have replicant technology capable of PSI-powers at hand to reach their goals. You play as Joe Chip, a specialist used to train, equip and lead a combat squad of selected individuals (with several skills including weapon and PSI skills) into missions against the Hollis Corporation and to protect companies against industrial spying from other companies Joe Chip works for a company called Runciter Associates in Los Angeles.

The game was released on 3 CDs on the Sony Playstation and Windows platform. The game was not a significant commercial success, failing to achieve expected sales by the company. It has since become a cult favorite.

name: Ubongo Puzzle Adventure
summary:
Fast-paced, addictive, and easy to learn â€“ Ubongo brings excitement and fun to your Nintendo Switch.

In this fast-paced game, you'll need to use your wits to solve a puzzle of various shapes as quickly as possible. Download the ultimate puzzle fun and see how quickly you can turn these puzzles around.

Discover four exotic worlds in the Solo campaign. Take on hundreds of gripping levels in the Baobab Savanna, on the wild Fang River, in the Whispering Jungle, and in the sandy Canyon of Bones. Join a zebra, a crocodile, a gorilla, and a rattlesnake on a journey through their puzzle worlds, challenging you with increasingly tricky puzzles.

name: Ubusuna
summary: Japanese downloadable "shooting game" for the PlayStation 4, headed by Ikaruga creator Hiroshi Iuchi.

name: UberStrike
summary: UberStrike is a Free to Play FPS and is Facebook's largest FPS.

name: U.B. Funkeys
summary: U.B. Funkeys is a computer game that is played in combination with USB toys called Funkeys. There are 45 toys in all.

name: UberBrix
summary: UberBrix is a sandbox building game in which players can create their own virtual worlds.

name: UberSoldier
summary:
UberSoldier is a World War II-based first person shooter, developed by Burut and released in 2006.

UberSoldier follows the journey of the fictitious Karl Stolz, a Nazi soldier who has, through the process of being killed in duty, then being resurrected, acquired supernatural powers which aid him in combat. Just before he was indoctrinated by the Nazis, a member of the German Resistance rescued him and effectively changed his loyalties. Karl Stolz now became the UberSoldier of the German Resistance helping them destroy the "UberSoldier fabrication" infrastructure.

name: U-Boot 1945
summary: Commanding a submarine U-boot IIVc, get through the hostile dangerous waters full of traps, to the friendly shores.

name: Ubermosh: Santicide
summary: Santicide is the latest volume of the arcade series Ubermosh. A must buy for arcade and top-down enthusiasts.

name: Ubermosh Vol.7
summary: The Colony is expanding, the Saints of New Ultakaar in their path to Ascension (and to bring us Enlightenment) can call a... UUUBERMOSHH!!

name: Ubercold
summary: A stylish parody game featuring an unconventional weapon.

name: Ubermosh: Omega
summary: Ubermosh: Omega, the apex of Walter Machado's Cult Classic series Ubermosh.

name: Ubisoft Triple Pack
summary:
Beyond Good & Evil

Play as Jade, a young investigative reporter, and expose a terrible government conspiracy. Wary of her government's promises to repel the aliens for good, she sets out to capture the truth behind the prolonged war. Armed with a camera, a dai-jo staff, and fierce determination, it's your job to save your planet and its inhabitants.

From Dust

From Dust is the latest original game concept by Eric Chahi, creator of the cult classic, "Another World / Out of this World".

Immerse yourself in a world as exotically beautiful as it is dangerous! You control the destiny of a primitive tribe against the backdrop of a world in constant evolution-a universe where mighty Nature reclaims what is hers; and your mastery of the elements is your people's only chance of survival.

Outland

In the middle of Balance and Chaos, now stands one man whose efforts may bridge the ancient divide, or doom the world to destruction.

The award-winning studio Housemarque, maker of Super Stardust HD, has teamed up with Ubisoft to create an ambitious platformer inspired by epic adventures such as the Prince of Persia series. Each player's adventure will take him between light and darkness and force him to adapt to an ever-changing world.

name: Uberlaufer
summary: You are a German solider in 1940 who opposed the Third Reich. Incarcerated by the SS, you must escape the procedurally-generated dungeon with the assistance of the German resistance using environmental clues to avoid detection by guards. Every playthrough is different.

name: Ubok.
summary: Japanese Yume Nikki fangame, known for its medical and skeletal motifs. In Ubok, the player needs to collect effects and scattered pages in the dreams of Eric, the main character.

name: Uboat Commander
summary: "U-boat Commander" is an upcoming strategy game in which players take a Wolfpack commander role in the Second World War. Their task is to plan, synchronize, and execute u-boat attacks on Allied convoys in the Atlantic Ocean.

name: Ubirajara
summary: Come discover a world full of Brazilian cultural personalities, with several exclusive powers to be used strategically, play win and try to be the best by entering the world rank!

name: Uboat Mechanic Simulator
summary: The new kind of mechanic is in the town - if you've ever dreamt about repairing big large underwater boats this is the place just for you! Check the damage, repair and fix the boats and make sure they're ready to be manned.

name: Uber Squad
summary: A fast-paced action roguelike game...

name: UberFlight
summary: UberFlight is intense flying game where you score points by flying risky through procedurally generated worlds.

name: Ubiquatopia
summary: Card-based strategy game.

name: Uber Destruction
summary: Uber Destruction is a 2D fast-pace side-scrolling roguelike featuring intense battles with immense hoards of enemies, scaling difficulty, an arsenal of weaponry, and a variety of obtainable upgrades. Take the wheel and drive through the bullet hell madness!

name: Ubel
summary: A visual novel where eight participants are forced to play a death game where they have to vote every two hours. Who will survive? Who will betray? Who are the masterminds behind it all?

name: UBoat: The Silent Wolf
summary: UBOAT: The Silent Wolf is a simulator of a submarine from WWII era, yet different than all you have seen so far. It is a survival sandbox with crew management mechanics while its primary theme is life of German sailors. The boat is their home, but it can become their grave at any time.

name: Ubaste
summary: Ubaste is a 3D platform jumping game, maneuver your cute cat to the finish line!

name: Uberslaughter
summary: Uberslaughter is an adrenaline-pumping retro Movement Shooter that pays homage to classic FPS. Embark on a gory inter-dimensional odyssey in order to neutralize high-priority targets. Butcher you way through hordes of enemies. Accumulate vast riches. Rescue a helpless kitten. And slaughter them all.

name: Uber Urban
summary: A modern, indie, interpretation on the well established genre of city builders; meet Uber Urban. With genre-defining mechanics as well as more innovative ones, Uber Urban enables players to build the city of their dreams like never before.

name: Ubermensch
summary: Multiplayer movement shooter with foreboding vibes

name: Ubersoldier
summary: Get ready for an epic World War II adventure like no other with UberSoldier! Immerse yourself in a gripping first-person shooter that will transport you to the heart of the action. This game developed by Burut Creative Team will have you on the edge of your seat.

name: Uberich: Advent Sinners
summary: The elusive shadow, the horrifying tunnel, the assassin, the haunted ruin, the High-orbit Space Station, the Creators, the Power Words, the religious wars, and the organization that only exist in Annie's words. What kind of future will it create when these seemingly irrelevant pieces come together?

name: Uboat Attack
summary: Rise through the ranks and become a legendary commander!

name: Uboat Attack: Zeppelin DLC
summary: Board the great Zeppelin and rule the skies!

name: Uboat Attack: Vortice DLC
summary: Board the cunning Vortice and control the battlefield!

name: Uboat Attack: Cloverfield DLC
summary: Board the mighty Cloverfield and tear down your enemies!

name: U-Boot: The Board Game - Digital Edition
summary: A digital version of the iconic U-BOOT The Board Game. Manage the crew of a powerful warship during World War II. Explore enemy territory, win battles using the strength of a steel giant and reliable tactics, and most importantly - overcome the blue abyss.

name: Ubu
summary: Ubu is a kinetic visual novel that forces the player to solve a 'rebus' puzzle in order to understand a character's dialogue.

name: Ubai: To Take Another Man's Property
summary: Take your pick between following Asami or Tsubaki in this exciting visual novel. Skip text you've already read with a handy skip button or enjoy the story with the auto button. Choose your story with differing endings and unveil how their story concludes.
